skill, ,, and, a, art, form, without, true, equal, in, global, sport, ., the, concept, be, bear, of, a, desire, to, claim, a, edge, ,, with, the, main, advantage, be, that, switch-hitter, never, see, the, break, ball, move, away, from, they, ., for, instance, ,, a, slider, throw, by, a, right-handed, pitcher, will, typically, break, away, from, a, right-handed, hitter, ., by, turn, around, and, hit, from, the, opposite, side, ,, a, switch-hitter, will, have, that, same, pitch, break, inward, ,, afford, they, a, longer, view, and, a, greater, chance, of, connect, on, the, sweet, spot, ., the, first, great, switch-hitter, be, George, Davis, ,, who, drive, in, 135, run, for, the, New, York, Giants, in, 1897, en, route, to, the, hall, of, Fame, ., despite, he, success, ,, switch-hitting, remain, a, rarity, in, the, Majors, ,, adopt, mainly, by, quirky, journeyman, seek, a, new, tool, as, they, old, one, erode, ., that, all, change, in, 1951, ,, however, ,, when, a, kid, from, Commerce, ,, Oklahoma, make, he, debut, with, the, New, York, Yankees, ., relate, :, the, Houston, Astros, have, turn, they, season, around, by, do, nothing, with, blonde, hair, ,, blue, eye, and, comic, book, muscle, ,, Mickey, Mantle, write, he, name, alongside, the, great, of, baseball, history, ., he, be, adore, by, a, nation, ,, particularly, by, child, ,, who, imitate, everything, he, do, ,, from, play, center, field, to, switch-hitting, ., as, the, Mick, enjoy, phenomenal, success, ,, there, be, a, immediate, surge, in, the, number, of, people, batting, from, both, side, ., that, notion, extend, to, the, next, generation, ,, as, man, who, idolize, Mantle, encourage, they, child, to, hit, right, -, and, left-handed, ., still, ,, even, within, baseball, ,, the, switch-hitter, be, a, relatively, rare, phenomenon, ., move, away, from, baseball, ,, and, it, be, even, more, rare, ., why, do, athlete, eschew, a, tactic, that, can, give, they, a, advantage, ?, the, twenty20, version, of, cricket, place, greater, emphasis, on, batting, nuance, ,, and, form, of, switch-hitting, have, seep, into, the, game, more, recently, ., although, player, such, as, Pakistan, 's, Mushtaq, Mohammad, have, try, switch, hit, in, the, 1970, ,, England, star, Kevin, Pietersen, bring, it, to, prominence, during, a, one-day, international, against, New, Zealand, in, 2008, ., there, be, initially, some, consternation, ,, mainly, due, to, the, game, 's, inherent, conservatism, ,, and, the, International, Cricket, Council, have, to, rule, on, the, legality, of, switch-hitting, ., while, other, cricketer, now, use, the, skill, ,, it, remain, just, one, tool, in, the, arsenal, of, a, batter, ,, use, to, deceive, and, outwit, the, oppose, team, ., therefore, ,, switch-hitting, in, cricket, be, far, more, spontaneous, than, in, baseball, :, a, surprise, attack, rather, than, a, element, of, transparent, competition, ., this, be, a, prevailing, theme, throughout, sport, ,, with, occasional, instance, of, ambidexterity, crop, up, but, nothing, on, a, scale, comparable, to, baseball, ., it, be, not, uncommon, to, see, NBA, or, NHL, player, shoot, with, either, hand, ,, but, that, be, inspire, by, a, need, to, improvise, in, fast-moving, ,, free-flowing, game, ., the, same, be, true, of, soccer, and, many, combat, sport, ,, such, as, boxing, and, martial, art, ., in, snooker, ,, Ronnie, O'Sullivan, can, play, shot, with, either, hand, ,, negate, the, need, for, a, cue, extension, -lrb-, and, some, say, just, to, show, off, -rrb-, ,, but, few, other, be, truly, proficient, in, the, skill, ,, so, it, do, not, dominate, the, game, ., but, baseball, be, different, ., it, be, a, game, of, codify, action, ,, in, which, a, long, series, of, individual, and, clearly-defined, event, comprise, the, overall, narrative, ., therefore, ,, the, act, of, switch-hitting, ,, so, difficult, in, theory, ,, be, a, pre-planned, choice, in, baseball, ,, and, that, make, it, one, of, the, most, unique, and, underrated, task, in, the, sport, realm, ., while, the, discipline, be, deserving, of, greater, appreciation, ,, the, actual, value, of, switch-hitting, be, difficult, to, quantify, ., one, perceive, advantage, ,, from, a, front, office, standpoint, ,, be, that, the, additional, flexibility, aid, roster, construction, ., that, be, a, interesting, argument, ,, but, one, that, be, often, overstate, ., give, that, most, switch-hitter, have, one, dominant, side, ,, be, the, double, effort, of, batting, from, the, other, side, really, worth, it, ,, for, such, a, small, ,, incalculable, and, unproven, advantage, ?, Mantle, take, 66, %, of, he, career, plate, appearance, as, a, left-handed, hitter, ,, but, hit, 69, %, of, he, home, run, from, that, side, ., he, hit, for, a, higher, average, as, a, righty, ,, but, what, if, he, have, just, concentrate, on, one, swing, ?, perhaps, he, power, number, would, have, be, even, more, astonishing, ., in, this, regard, ,, a, argument, can, be, make, that, switch-hitting, actually, suppress, raw, talent, rather, than, diversify, it, ., among, switch-hitter, ,, only, Pete, Rose, and, Eddie, ,, Frisch, 's, lefty, average, be, take, as, he, career, mark, ,, it, would, rank, 36th, all-time, ,, more, than, half, the, way, up, that, list, compare, with, he, switch-hitting, record, ., that,
